mapper.sql: id, userCode, code, createTime, payTime, payType, sendTime, completeTime, deliveryType, deliveryTime, deliveryCode, totalPrice, supplyCode, description, status
mapper.update:
UPDATE order_orders
userCode = #{map.userCode},
code = #{map.code},
createTime = #{map.createTime},
payTime = #{map.payTime},
payType = #{map.payType},
sendTime = #{map.sendTime},
completeTime = #{map.completeTime},
deliveryType = #{map.deliveryType},
deliveryTime = #{map.deliveryTime},
deliveryCode = #{map.deliveryCode},
totalPrice = #{map.totalPrice},
supplyCode = #{map.supplyCode},
description = #{map.description},
status = #{map.status},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
